countries.name: SPACE
countries.description: Why did you click here at all?

countries.name: AFRICA
countries.description: Home to majestic landscapes and diverse wildlife â€“ where lions have their own version of 'Netflix and chill.'

countries.name: NEAR EAST
countries.description: Where the coffee is closer than your neighbors, and 'near' is a subjective term.

countries.name: EUROPE
countries.description: The land of diverse cultures, where debating about the best way to make tea is a serious diplomatic affair.

countries.name: GREENLAND
countries.description: Because who needs green when you've got ice?

countries.name: NORTH AMERICA
countries.description: Where they invented the term 'fast food' and then took it as a personal challenge.

countries.name: MEXICO
countries.description: The country that mastered the art of turning a siesta into a national treasure.

countries.name: CUBA
countries.description: Vintage cars, vibrant culture, and a political climate hotter than its salsa dancing.

countries.name: SOUTH AMERICA
countries.description: Because who needs winter when you can have Carnival all year round?

countries.name: RUSSIA
countries.description: Where winter is not a season; it's a lifestyle, and bears might as well be citizens with how casually they stroll through the streets.

countries.name: ASIA
countries.description: The land of contrasts, where ancient traditions and cutting-edge technology coexist, and pandas have diplomatic immunity

countries.name: OCEAN
countries.description: The vast expanse of water that has mastered the art of remaining mysteriously silent about its fishy business.
